title: Steinway Hall
seo_title: Steinway Hall | WestHouse Hotel New York
seo_description: The flagship store of Steinway & Sons, Steinway Hall has been a landmark destination for music enthusiasts, piano students and professional musicians since 1925. The elegant showrooms display more than 150 Steinway and Steinway-designed Boston and Essex instruments on three floors.
contents:
109 W 57th Street

The flagship store of Steinway & Sons, Steinway Hall has been a landmark destination for music enthusiasts, piano students and professional musicians since 1925. The elegant showrooms display more than 150 Steinway and Steinway-designed Boston and Essex instruments on three floors.
